Privacy

Bookwhen Ltd (" we ", " us ", " our ") are committed to protecting and respecting your privacy.
As you interact with our Services, the Bookwhen Website or emails, we automatically collect Technical Data about your device, browsing actions, patterns, Location Data and Usage Data.
As you interact with our Services, the Bookwhen Website or emails, we automatically collect Technical Data about your device, browsing actions, patterns, Location Data and Usage Data.

We use cookies or similar tracking technology, on the Bookwhen Website and in the Services to distinguish you from other users of the Bookwhen Website and Services.
We use persistent cookies and session cookies.
We use persistent cookies to save your login information for future logins to the Bookwhen Website or Services.
We use session cookies to enable certain features of the Bookwhen Website or Services, to better understand how you interact with the Bookwhen Website or Services and to monitor aggregate usage by users and web traffic routing on the Bookwhen Website.
